    • Constructor Detail

      • Background

        @Deprecated
public Background(Disposable parent)
        Deprecated. use Invoker.forBackgroundThreadWithReadAction(com.intellij.openapi.Disposable) instead
        Creates the invoker of user read actions on a background thread.
        Parameters:
        parent - a disposable parent object

      • Background

        @Deprecated
public Background(Disposable parent,
                  int maxThreads)
        Deprecated. use Invoker.forBackgroundPoolWithReadAction(com.intellij.openapi.Disposable) instead
        Creates the invoker of user read actions on background threads.
        Parameters:
        parent - a disposable parent object
        maxThreads - the number of threads used for parallel calculation, where 1 guarantees sequential calculation, which allows not to use additional synchronization

      • Background

        @Deprecated
public Background(Disposable parent,
                  boolean useReadAction)
        Deprecated. use Invoker.forBackgroundThreadWithReadAction(com.intellij.openapi.Disposable) or Invoker.forBackgroundThreadWithoutReadAction(com.intellij.openapi.Disposable) instead
        Creates the invoker of user tasks on a background thread.
        Parameters:
        parent - a disposable parent object
        useReadAction - true to run user tasks as read actions with write action priority, false to run user tasks without read locks

      • Background

        @Deprecated
public Background(Disposable parent,
                  ThreeState useReadAction)
        Deprecated. use Invoker.forBackgroundThreadWithReadAction(com.intellij.openapi.Disposable) or Invoker.forBackgroundThreadWithoutReadAction(com.intellij.openapi.Disposable) instead
        Creates the invoker of user tasks on a background thread.
        Parameters:
        parent - a disposable parent object
        useReadAction - YES to run user tasks as read actions with write action priority, NO to run user tasks without read locks, UNSURE does not guarantee that read action is allowed

      • Background

        @Deprecated
public Background(Disposable parent,
                  ThreeState useReadAction,
                  int maxThreads)
        Deprecated. use Invoker.forBackgroundThreadWithReadAction(com.intellij.openapi.Disposable) or Invoker.forBackgroundThreadWithoutReadAction(com.intellij.openapi.Disposable) instead
        Creates the invoker of user tasks on background threads.
        Parameters:
        parent - a disposable parent object
        useReadAction - YES to run user tasks as read actions with write action priority, NO to run user tasks without read locks, UNSURE does not guarantee that read action is allowed
        maxThreads - the number of threads used for parallel calculation, where 1 guarantees sequential calculation, which allows not to use additional synchronization

        public boolean isValidThread()
        Description copied from class: Invoker
        Returns true if the current thread allows to process a task.
        Overrides:
        isValidThread in class Invoker
        Returns:
        true if the current thread is valid, or false otherwise
